knimeNode.name: Local Thresholding
knimeNode.shortDescription: Performs an efficient local binary thresholding on an input image.

fullDescription.intro: The local thresholding is performed in an efficient way. If possible (depends on the chosen method) an integral image approach is used which is very fast.

tab.name: options
tab.option: The used thresholding Method: Mean, Median, Sauvola, MidGrey, Bernsen, Niblack. Mean, Niblack and Sauvola are implemented using the fast integral image approach.

Thresholding method dependent parameters. Window size specifies the size of the local region. Other parameters: Contrast threshold (needed for Bernsen), c (constant offset value, needed for Mean, Median, Niblack and MidGrey), k (needed for Niblack and Sauvola with different values) and r (needed for Sauvola).
